md:
giải nghĩa từ "premiere" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Premiere (noun) - Ra mắt (movie, play, etc.)

* Meaning: The first public performance of a movie, play, or other work.
* Example sentence: The premiere of the new Star Wars movie was held at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles.
* Related words: debut, launch, opening
* Antonyms: finale, conclusion

Premiere (verb) - Ra mắt (to introduce or show something for the first time)

* Meaning: To introduce or show something for the first time.
* Example sentence: The company will premiere its new product at the trade show next week.
* Related words: launch, introduce, debut
* Antonyms: conclude, finish

Note: The verb "premiere" is often used in the context of introducing a new product, service, or idea, while the noun "premiere" refers to the first public performance of a work.
